scripts.orm:schema:sync: tsc --build tsconfig.json && cp .env ./dist/.env && cd dist && npx typeorm schema:sync
scripts.orm:schema:log: tsc --build tsconfig.json && cp .env ./dist/.env && cd dist && npx typeorm schema:log
scripts.orm:schema:drop: tsc --build tsconfig.json && cp .env ./dist/.env && cd dist && npx typeorm schema:drop
scripts.orm:query: tsc --build tsconfig.json && cp .env ./dist/.env && cd dist && npx typeorm query $1
scripts.orm:entity:create: tsc --build tsconfig.json && cp .env ./dist/.env && cd dist && npx typeorm entity:create
scripts.orm:subscriber:create: tsc --build tsconfig.json && cp .env ./dist/.env && cd dist && npx typeorm subscriber:create
scripts.orm:migration:create: tsc --build tsconfig.json && cp .env ./dist/.env && cd dist && npx typeorm migration:create
scripts.orm:migration:generate: tsc --build tsconfig.json && cp .env ./dist/.env && cd dist && npx typeorm migration:generate
scripts.orm:migration:run: tsc --build tsconfig.json && cp .env ./dist/.env && cd dist && npx typeorm migration:run
scripts.orm:migration:status: tsc --build tsconfig.json && cp .env ./dist/.env && cd dist && npx typeorm migration:show
scripts.orm:migration:revert: tsc --build tsconfig.json && cp .env ./dist/.env && cd dist && npx typeorm migration:revert
scripts.orm:cache:clear: tsc --build tsconfig.json && cp .env ./dist/.env && cd dist && npx typeorm cache:clear
